title: cant pay with paysafe patch 6.22
body: why cant i buy with paysafe it just loads and loads when i try login to my pasysafe acc

replies.body:
Try restarting your computer to see if anything changes. If it doesn't, this may be caused by a poor connection to PaySafe's servers, and I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if anything changed.
